DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug and an approved drug in the treatment of osteoarthritis of the knee and hip.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of MK0663 and an Approved Drug in the Treatment of Osteoarthritis (0663-077)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 26 weeks.
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis of the knee or hip which requires treatment with medication for pain relief Any known allergies to the study drugs
